Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista Enzymatic Creatinine Flex Reagent Cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista Enzymatic Creatinine Flex Reagent Cartridge and Dimension Vista Enzymatic Creatinine Calibrator for quantitative measurement and calibration of creatinine in serum, plasma, and urine using an enzymatic method on the Dimension Vista System.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of creatinine in human serum, plasma and urine on the Dimension Vista System; used in diagnosis/treatment of renal diseases, monitoring dialysis, and as a calculation basis for other urine analytes; calibrator for ECREA method.
